zh.title: Solana/美元技术分析：[看涨趋势逐渐形成]
zh.content:
当前Solana（SOL）价格为144.29美元，近期24小时内上涨2.54%。从价格走势来看，SOL在140.66美元的低点附近获得了强劲支撑，并在短期内突破了143美元的阻力位，显示出看涨趋势逐渐形成。

在技术指标方面，MACD值为0.71806078，表明当前动能偏向多头。虽然RSI尚未提供，但可以推测当前市场情绪相对乐观。SMA(20)在138.3655美元附近提供了重要的支撑位，若价格回调至此水平，可能会吸引买盘介入。

从支撑和阻力来看，重要的支撑位在140美元附近，而144.34美元的高点则是下一个关注的阻力位。如果价格突破此阻力，有望进一步上涨至150美元。建议投资者密切关注价格走势，并考虑在回调时分批进场，或者在突破关键阻力位后增加仓位，以把握潜在的上涨机会。

en.title: Solana vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Solana (SOL) at $144.29 reflects a modest 2.54% increase over the past 24 hours. This upward movement indicates a potential bullish trend, particularly as the price approaches the recent high of $144.34. The low of $140.66 serves as a crucial support level, suggesting that if the price retraces, buyers may step in around this level. The overall market sentiment appears positive, which could further drive the price upward.

In terms of technical indicators, the current MACD reading of 0.71806078 indicates that the momentum is in favor of buyers, though the absence of a signal line makes it challenging to confirm a sustained upward trend. Meanwhile, the simple moving average (SMA) of 20 periods at $138.3655 is positioned below the current price, providing a solid support level. A potential crossover in the MACD could signal an entry point for traders looking to capitalize on further gains.

Traders should watch for resistance around the recent high of $144.34, as a breakout above this level could signal a continuation of the bullish trend. Conversely, if the price fails to maintain above this level and drops below the SMA, traders may consider short positions, particularly if the price nears the support level at $140.66. Monitoring volume can also provide insights into the strength of any breakout or reversal.

In summary, the outlook for SOL/USD appears cautiously optimistic, with support at $140.66 and resistance at $144.34. Traders should remain vigilant for key indicators that could confirm the trend direction. Establishing positions near the support level while setting stop-loss orders just below could provide a balanced risk-reward strategy in this market environment.
